remarks: Equality has existential uniqueness (split into 3 cases).  (Contributed by NM, 5-Apr-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 28-Sep-2015.)
statement:
eueq3dc.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
eueq3dc.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
eueq3dc.3 $e |- C e. _V $.
eueq3dc.4 $e |- -. ( ph /\ ps ) $.
eueq3dc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( DECID ps -> E! x ( ( ph /\ x = A ) \/ ( -. ( ph \/ ps ) /\ x = B ) \/ ( ps /\ x = C ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
$d ps x $.
